title: Chada Thai
description: Serves meat, veg options available. Family owned/operated; all are vegans except for the father. Offers a vegetarian menu what includes around 5 main courses and 2 starters, of which some are vegan or can be made vegan. Main courses can be ordered with tofu, but ask for the GMO-free one. The curry paste (green) is made-in-house and vegan, according to restaurant's information.
